name: Water Slide: Thrilling Amazing
description:
Feel and live through the excitement of riding on a realistic water slide in 3D water parks! Control the speeds of the rides and be careful while making sharp turns at intersections of a massive waterslide in this realistic 3D racing game. Chase the adrenaline rush as you twist and tilt your way round tight corners, make loops and whizz through at lightning speeds. But watch out, the edges are steep and there are some little surprises and gold coins along the way.
Features:
- Multiple Levels
- Realistic Game play
- Creative music
- Unbelievable 3D sounds effects
- Experience extreme water park surfing thrills.
- Master all levels in Level Mode.
